meanings.definition: Preventing the accumulation of cholesterol in the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended an anticholesterol diet to keep my heart healthy.
meanings.sent2: She took anticholesterol supplements to improve her overall health.
meanings.sent3: I joked that eating broccoli was like having an anticholesterol shield around my heart.
meanings.sent4: The new exercise routine acted like an anticholesterol superhero fighting off the bad fats.
meanings.sent5: The image of a shield made of anticholesterol foods stuck in my mind as a powerful protector.

meanings.definition: A substance or medication that lowers cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed an anticholesterol for his high cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: She bought anticholesterols from the pharmacy to manage her health.
meanings.sent3: The anticholesterol pills were like tiny warriors battling the bad cholesterol in his body.
meanings.sent4: The bottle of anticholesterol medication gleamed on the shelf like a beacon of health.
meanings.sent5: The word 'anticholesterol' on the label reassured her that it would help lower her cholesterol levels.

meanings.sent1: The anticholesterol medication helped in balancing his cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent2: She used anticholesterol creams to protect her skin from cholesterol damage.
meanings.sent3: The anticholesterol lotion felt like a magical barrier against the harmful effects of cholesterol.
meanings.sent4: The anticholesterol properties of the food made it a great choice for heart health.
meanings.sent5: The idea of anticholesterol ingredients fighting against the cholesterol effects was intriguing and effective.
